entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Easy way to break the chain of covid19 is when ever there is flu in our family we all family members would close our eardrums with cotton soaked with domestic oil and the disease won't multiply
